intro.title: Welcome to the World of Zuul: SDG 15 - Life on Land
text: The natural world is under siege. Forests are disappearing, wildlife is vanishing, and our planet is losing its balance.
You are humanity's last hope to understand and restore harmony to life on land.
But beware: a relentless enemy, the Spirit of Neglect, hunts you as you attempt to solve the challenges in each biome.
You must answer correctly, protect the environment, and gather the tools needed to escape the Spirit's grasp.
Your mission: explore the five biomes, solve their challenges, and restore balance to the world.

good: Congratulations! You have restored balance to life on land.
Your efforts have saved countless species, protected habitats, and brought hope to humanity.
The Spirit of Neglect has been vanquished, and the future is brighter because of you.
bad: The Spirit of Neglect has caught up to you.
Your failure to address the challenges has left the environment in ruins.
The world is darker and poorer without the thriving life that once flourished.
